E.g. 12345</entry><entry name="customfield"/><entry name="xmlkey"/><entry name="xmlpath"/><entry name="modifiable">1</entry><entry name="multiline">0</entry><entry name="multilineIcon">0</entry><entry name="regex">^\d+$</entry><entry name="required">0</entry><entry name="initvalue"/><entry name="onchangereset"/><entry name="resetable">1</entry></properties></text><combo alt="1" dynamic="0" enabled="1" fill="b" filter="0" focus="0" id="UC4RB_VER_SCAN_LEVELs.00" nl="1" quotes="" strict="1" text="Scan All Nonfatal Top Level Modules" tooltip="If Auto Scan field is set to 'No', this parameter is ignored. If field is set to 'Yes' and if the application has more than one module, and at least one of the top-level modules does not have any fatal errors, it starts the scan for those modules after prescan is complete." vtype="i"><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptname|@id"/><command owner="_self" owneraction="setsource" ownerparam="src|_dialog@src"/><command owner="_promptsetcontainer" owneraction="getData" request="getpromptcombolist" target="_self" targetaction="setlist" wait="0"/><properties><entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.VARA.YES_NO_PROMPT_TRUE_FALSE_VALUE</entry><entry name="text">Scan All Nonfatal Top Level Modules</entry><entry name="quotes"/><entry name="id">UC4RB_VER_SCAN_LEVELs.00</entry><entry name="enabled">0</entry><entry name="focus">0</entry><entry name="tooltip">If Auto Scan field is set to 'No', this parameter is ignored. If field is set to 'Yes' and if the application has more than one module, and at least one of the top-level modules does not have any fatal errors, it starts the scan for those modules after prescan is complete.</entry><entry name="dynamic">0</entry><entry name="customfield"/><entry name="xmlkey"/><entry name="xmlpath"/><entry name="modifiable">1</entry><entry name="initvalue"/><entry name="onchangereset"/><entry name="resetable">1</entry></properties></combo></readpanel></dialog>
